price: Mofri N’akyi (de bata Ne ho no) ho. Enti mo nyinaa monkͻ apam ntia me, na momma me ahomegye berε.
arabic: مِن دُونِهِۦۖ فَكِيدُونِي جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ لَا تُنظِرُونِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: min dūnihi fakīdūnī jamīʿan thumma lā tunẓirūni
